ccre.log

Class NetworkAutologger

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.log.NetworkAutologger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CluckRemoteListener, LoggingTarget

    public final class NetworkAutologger
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoggingTarget, CluckRemoteListener
    A logging tool that shares all logging between networked cluck systems automatically.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NetworkAutologger(CluckNode node)
      Create a new NetworkAutologger hooked up to the specified node.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handle(java.lang.String remote, int remoteType)
      Handle information about the specified remote of the specified RMT type.
      void log(LogLevel level, java.lang.String message, java.lang.String extended)
      Log the given message at the given level with an optional extended string.
      void log(LogLevel level, java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      Log the given message at the given level with an optional throwable (can be null).
      static void register()
      Register a new global NetworkAutologger with the logging manager.
      void start()
      Start the Autologger - it will now start sending out logged messages.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkAutologger

        public NetworkAutologger(CluckNode node)
        Create a new NetworkAutologger hooked up to the specified node.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to attach to.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register()
        Register a new global NetworkAutologger with the logging manager. This only occurs once - after that an warning will be logged again.

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the Autologger - it will now start sending out logged messages.

      • log

                java.lang.String message,
                java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Description copied from interface: LoggingTarget
        Log the given message at the given level with an optional throwable (can be null).
        Specified by:
        log in interface LoggingTarget
        Parameters:
        level - the level to log at.
        message - the message to log.
        throwable - the optional throwable to log.

      • log

        public void log(LogLevel level,
                java.lang.String message,
                java.lang.String extended)
        Description copied from interface: LoggingTarget
        Log the given message at the given level with an optional extended string. (usually more details, such as a throwable traceback or instructions on how to fix the error)
        Specified by:
        log in interface LoggingTarget
        Parameters:
        level - the level to log to.
        message - the message to log.
        extended - the optional extended message to log.
